frege.runtime

Class Runtime

  • java.lang.Object
    • frege.runtime.Runtime

  • public class Runtime
extends java.lang.Object
    Miscellanous functions and methods needed in frege.

      • stdRandom

        public static final java.util.Random stdRandom
        GLobal Random generator

      • stdout

        public static java.lang.ThreadLocal<java.io.PrintWriter> stdout
        Provide UTF-8 encoded standard printer for stdout with automatic line flushing

        Must be thread local so that it works in the online REPL, for instance.

      • stderr

        Utility method used by Char.show to quote a character.

      • copySerializable

        public static final <T extends java.io.Serializable> T copySerializable(T o)

        This is used to copy a mutable value.

        The returned value is of same type, but is considered immutable. Suitable for instances of classes that do not implement Cloneable, but do implement Serializable.

        Parameters:
        o - the value to copy
        Returns:
        a copy obtained by serialization of the argument value, followed by deserialization

      • identity

        public static final <T> T identity(T x)
        Identity function for reference types (Can be used to pseudo thaw/freeze a value)

      • arrayThaw

        public static final <T> T[] arrayThaw(T[] a)
        Thaw a readonly array by cloning it

      • itemAt

        public static final java.lang.Object itemAt(java.lang.String value,
                      int offset)

        Cheat with phantom types.

        This method is announced with type String a -> Int -> a but it always returns a char.

        This is fine as long as nobody is able to actually create a value with type, say String Int.
        This could be done only with another malicious native function, though.

      • runMain

        public static java.lang.Integer runMain(java.lang.Object arg)

        Run a IO action as main program.

        *

        Called from the java main method of a frege program. This converts the argument String array to a list and passes this to the compiled frege main function, if it is a function. The result is an IO action of type IO a to which then IO.performUnsafe is applied. The resulting Lambda then actually executes the frege code when evaluated.

      • exit

        public static final void exit()

        public static final void setExitCode(int a)
